article_node.title: Plan for Israeli Settlements Advances and Will ‘Bury’ Palestinian Statehood, Minister Vows
article_node.summary: Israeli Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich announced the approval of a plan to expand a settlement near occupied East Jerusalem, which he claims will hinder the establishment of a Palestinian state. The plan includes the construction of approximately 3,400 new housing units, but final approval is still pending from the Supreme Planning Council. This announcement has drawn condemnation from various countries and organizations, with critics labeling it a violation of international law and an act of aggression against Palestinian rights.
